content: Hello Stephanie! Today we'll discuss daily routines. How do you start your day?
Yeah, many things. I read, I pray, I stretch, I read the news and have my coffee.
That sounds lovely! What's your favorite book genre to read in the morning?
Great variety! Do you have a favorite book or author that you keep coming back to?
No worries! What kind of news topics do you usually follow in the morning?
